(2, 1, 1): Roman Catholics, Eastern Catholics, Old Catholics, Protestants, Eastern Orthodox, Oriental Orthodox, Anglicans and other Christians
(4, 1, 1): Celebrates the descent of the Holy Spirit upon the Apostles and other followers of Jesus; birth of the Church
(5, 1, 1): Religious (church) services, festive meals, processions, baptism, confirmation, ordination, folk customs, dancing, spring & woodland rites, festive clothing
(6, 1, 1): Prayer, vigils, fasting (pre-festival), novenas, retreats, Holy Communion, litany
